pages.text: Surviving in space is no walk in the park, To simply stay in space you will need the oxygen to breathe and the protection of space's chilly grasp.$(br2)Beyond!  The best equipment for space survival, the space suit!

To withstand the harsh boiling environments of Venus and Mercury, it is severly recommended to upgrade your space suit to netherite level using a smithing table.$(br2)It may also protect you against other 'Factors' that are not part of the environment
